overview.intro: The College of Agriculture and Life Sciences is one of the worldâ€™s leading institutions of agriculture, with more than 160 years of leadership in science, education and extension. The college educates future leaders, conducts mission-oriented research and shares new knowledge for the betterment of Iowa and the world. The college is one of eight colleges at Iowa State University, which is one of the most influential land grant universities in the nation.

external_news_story.headline: Researchers Using Hair to Gauge Stress Response in Pigs
external_news_story.body_copy: Animal science researchers at lowa State are trying to if find out if trimming pigs' hair can provide insight into how they respond to stressors they encounter through life, including disease.
